title: Automated Cyber Threat Intelligence
description: The Cardano ecosystem is producing massive volumes of data, we need a scalable framework to correlate this data into real-time threats.
solution: Monitor, correlate, and proactively act on events from various real-time and batch data sources to detect anomalies and respond to incidents
experience: We are leading consultants in many of the world's most influential emerging technologies with a key focus on event driven cybersecurity.
